So I finally opened my Etsy account. I've been working on this project for 
awhile so its a relief that it's finally open. I've created polymer clay 
versions of some of my favorite youtuber, including Tyler. If you're not 
doing anything too important (most likely you aren't because youtube is 
usually used as an outlet for boredom) I would be delighted if you checked 
it out. It won't hurt. You might even like them. But regardless, have a 
wonderful day!                                 
https://www.etsy.com/shop/SkipsClay﻿

captions.text: - Well, hello everyone.
My name is Tyler Oakley and today I am
currently headed to London.
But I was like, "You know what?"
Y'all need a Q&A before I go.

So it is time
(clap)

for another
(clap)

Q
(clap)
and slay.

(clap)
(soft Caribbean music)
Hmm.
Wyatt says, what is your favorite flower

and I was kind of going
through all the emogi flowers

and trying to pick which
one I would actually like.
But then I'm like, "You know what?"

They're not including
some important flowers.
One of them being cat's tails.
I'm not sure if this is a flower.
It probably isn't.
It's the thing that's in a swamp.
I'm going to show a picture right here.
But it's the cutest flower
because it's unique just like me.

And I wanted to wear it
for prom as my boutonniere
but I just wan't able to do that.
I asked the florist, I was like,

"May I have a cat's
tail as my boutonniere?"
And he was like, "No way."
So I guess the moral of story is

just because somebody says
something is not a flower
doesn't mean it isn't as beautiful as one.
A flower by any other name--
a rose by any other name?
Rose? From Titanic?

Infinitemofo says have you
named the deer on your wall yet?

And no, I haven't, but I have
some good recommendations

from when I asked you guys
in a Q&A a little bit ago.
Some of you said Eddeeran.
Some of you said Edeeranchris.

And honestly, I think my
favorite was Stagatha.

Maybe it can just have a
nickname every single video.
Maybe that's it. Is that okay?
I think today it's Stagatha.
Say hello to Stagatha.
Emilly says how do you pick the questions
that you answer in a Q and slay?

Well, girl, it doesn't hurt
if your picture is of me.
I mean, honestly, I am so into myself
that that truly pops out, whether or not
I want to admit it, that is true.
I'm sorry, I can't help it but my face
is attracted to my own face.

And good questions, if
you've got a good question,
girl, I'm here for it.
Sunshyne says what was your favorite part
about growing up in Michigan?
Uh, fall, autumn, leaves, crunching,

sitting around at a pumpkin
patch and sippin' on
frickin' (sighs) what is the word?
I forgot what it's called.

This is what happens when you
leave Michigan for this long.

Apple cider. That's
what I was looking for.

Honestly, if you've
never been to Michigan,
this was better than a Pure Michigan ad.
You're welcome.
Sydney says what is your Audible
recommendation this month?

As you guys know, I have a
little book club going on.
(rumbling noise off screen)
I have never been so disrespected.
I have a little book club going on

and that is if you use
Audible.com/TylerOakley
you get your first audiobook for free
just signing up through that link.

And this month I am
recommending Diary of a Mad Diva

by Joan Rivers because I
recently got to hang out
with the queen of comedy herself.
She is an absolute legend.
But I got to hang out with her.
Here is a picture of that.
But she was incredible and so feisty
and I was like, "Oh, my gosh,
"I cannot wait to read your book."
So if you want to get her book,
Diary of a Mad Diva, or any other book
that they offer on the website,
you can use Audible.com/TylerOakley
and get your first book free.

Go, enjoy, it's the
best thing in the world.
You're welcome in advance.
Cari says that do you like garage sales?
And yes, I like garage sales.

I like finding little trinkets
and bartering them down
and getting some little jewels
and treasures and things like that.
Funny story about garage sales.
My mom is obsessed with them
and she was recently, apparently, at one.

She updated her Facebook
and she was all like,
"Just got recognized at a garage sale."
#queenjackie and then all the comments

were calling her Queen
Jackie and I was like,
"Oh my gosh, we have created a monster."
Sophie says how do you feel about this?
Honestly, I don't feel good about it.

Elisa says would you
rather shave your eyebrows

for a million dollars or
your head for two million?

Girl, you know that I shaved
my head for zero dollars once.
It was the five year anniversary
of Britney shaving her head.
So, clearly, I had to shave my head.

I will be doing it again
at the 10 year anniversary.
So just stay tuned.
Would you ever go Tyler-punk?

Yes, obviously, I-- every
time I see edits like these

where I'm tatted up and
pierced and crazy-fun hair

and everything like that,
I want to just print it out

and take it to a person
who could make that happen
and be like, "Give me this."

Because y'all got a vision
and I want to execute it.
Becky says do you like bellybuttons?
No, Becky, I don't because, honestly,

I just feel like they're a knot
that will become unraveled.

And I'm not even quite sure
if it's actually like a knot
or how it actually happened.
Or, I know it was my umbilical cord
because I saw my birth, but I don't know

like logistically what
the fuck's going on.

I have an innie, if
that's any consolation.

I just am afraid that if
you touch it it's going

to come unraveled and
then all of my organs
are going to fall out.

(sucks teeth)
Which seems like a thing
that could happen.
So, no, Becky, I don't like bellybuttons.
Jess says, can you wear the burger costume
for the rest of the video?
You know what, Jess?
I can do something better.
Somebody gave me this.
It's like a burger hat (laughs).
I look ridiculous.

Somebody have me and this
and it's like a burger hat

and I'm living for it so
I hope you all enjoy that.

(claps)
That is all I have
for you guys today.

If you want to see my latest
Q&A, you can click right there.
My latest Friday video is right there.
My person of the week's right there.
All you gotta do is click right there
to get something like a shirt or a sweater

or a poster or something
that might be new.
Click it, you can send me a picture
of you being cute with it.
And you might be my person of the week.

And be sure to subscribe
because I have a new

Tuesday Q&A every Tuesday
and a fun Friday video
every single Friday.
So I will see you guys next time,

until then I'm gonna
go be cute in this hat.
So deuces, y'all, later.
(soft Caribbean music)
Can we talk about how amazing this mug is?
I am loving it.
It says, "Thinkin' 'bout butts,"
because, Lord, have mercy, Lord knows
I'm thinkin' 'bout butts, always.
